1011111011010100 1010110110101000 0 -> sum: 0110110001111100, cout: 1
1111111111000111 1010100001000111 0 -> sum: 1010100000001110, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
